name: Class Crush (GGJ 18)
description:
2 to 4 players game

In a classroom full of raving kids, will your love letter reach your sweetheart?

How to play

Each player send their letter into the fray of the classroom, hoping it will reach their respective sweetheart. Players can control the flow of the raving kids, trying to create a path for their letter, and slowdown the other players' letter.

d-pad or left stick : move cursor

A/B/X/Y : change arrow direction

Setup

Require 2-4 controllers. Controllers must be plugged in before launching the game. Works only with xbox 360 controllers or PS3 controllers.
